sentences.en: Disconsolate, Soapy ceased his unavailing racket.
sentences.cn: 索比怏怏不乐地停止了白费力气的闹嚷.

sentences.en: Efforts to reach the people named in the report proved unavailing.
sentences.cn: 联系过报告中所提到的那些人，但都徒劳无功。

sentences.en: Hurstwood heard the details of the weary and unavailing search that evening.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上,赫斯渥听到了这次劳而无获的寻找的详细情况.

sentences.en: Operation was performed 17 days later after invalid anticoagulant treatments and unavailing catheter fragmentation.
sentences.cn: 经过检查确定是大量肺栓塞,但是经过内科用肝素治疗,却发生血小板过低过低的副作用.
他们的努力都付诸东流。

sentences.en: unavailing efforts to make her happy
sentences.cn: 想使她快乐的徒劳努力

words.tran_cn: 无效的；徒劳的；无益的；无用的
